name: Lobby
description: You are facing North in the lobby of what seems to be a run down Manor House. Sunlight peeks through a dust covered window on the west wall. On the east wall - next to a heavy looking door - is a Grandfather Clock that is no longer working.

doors.name: Heavy Oak Door
doors.description: A sturdy oak door with brass fittings.

floor.name: Floor
floor.description: The marble floor is cracked and worn, with years of footsteps etched into its surface.

interactables.name: Grandfather Clock
interactables.description: A towering grandfather clock, its pendulum frozen in time.

containers.name: Clock Compartment
containers.description: A small door on the clock's face
